Package arcade.vis

Class Visualization

java.lang.Object
sim.display.GUIState
arcade.vis.Visualization
Direct Known Subclasses:
GrowthVisualization2D
public abstract class Visualization
extends sim.display.GUIState
Extension of GUIState wrapper of simulations for visualization.

Visualization organizes the visualization into Panel objects, on which visualizations are drawn, and Drawer objects, which draw the visualization through methods provided by the MASON library.

Since:
2.2
Version:
2.3.2
